name: WP CTA Top Bar
author: Alipio Gabriel

sections.faq:
Is your plugin free?

Yes! It’s totally 100% free and it will stay that way forever.

Does this plugin provide pro version?

No, what you see is what you get.
If you want an additional features you can contact me here.

Is this plugin safe to use?

This plugin is coded using the wordpress standard, so YES! it’s safe and secured
sections.changelog:
0.4.1

  • backend minor security update

0.4

  • Fixed the responsive style

0.3

  • Enable shortcode in Top bar Message.
  • Fixed the z-index issue between the plugin and WP Top Bar
  • Disabled cookies when login user can manage options.

0.2

  • Added default top bar message.

0.1

  • Initial stable release
sections.description:
Features:
– Set unlimited background color
– Set text color
– Cookie adjustment
– Content flexibility
– Allow shortcode in the top bar content
– Enable/Disable option
– Sticky Option
– User friendly menu

Installation

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin
  2. Find WP CTA Tob Bar plugin by Alipio Gabriel and click Install now
  3. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of wpctatopbar.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/
  4. Activate the plugin

Usage

This project is open source.
Fork it on github
https://github.com/alipiogabriel/wpctatopbar
